subject: Compatibility request
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team, 
  
  
  
  
  are any of your pedals compatible with a Fanatec DD Pro Wheelbase + a 
Playstation? 
  
  If yes, will the haptic engines / rumble motors also work? 
  
  
  
  
  Thank you for your reply and best regards,  
  
  Marcel D.

conversations.body_text: Hi Du. marcel,  Currently, it cannot be supported on PS4 or PS5 through Fanatec.Â
